sqlMap.statement: SELECT EAIBZWKDSTCD "bizCode", UPDATEBY "UpdateBy", CONCAT( EAISVCNAME , '.txt') "programNm", IFNULL(EAISVCDESC,'') "programDesc" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIHE01 WHERE UPDATEBY=#userId#
SELECT SUBSTR(LOUTNAME,1,3) "bizCode", UPDATEBY "UpdateBy", CONCAT( LOUTNAME , '.txt') "programNm", IFNULL(LOUTDESC,'') "programDesc" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAITR07 WHERE UPDATEBY=#userId#

SELECT SUBSTR(REPLACE(CNVSNNAME,'TRANSFORM_',''),1,3) "bizCode", UPDATEBY "UpdateBy", CONCAT( CNVSNNAME , '.txt') "programNm" , IFNULL(CNVSNDESC,'') "programDesc" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAITR01 WHERE UPDATEBY=#userId#
